argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | evlval.q | |- Q = ( I eval R ) |
| 2 |  | evlval.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 3 |  | evlrhm.w | |- W = ( I mPoly R ) |
| 4 |  | evlrhm.t | |- T = ( R ^s ( B ^m I ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_crngring | |- ( R e. CRing -> R e. Ring ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. CRing ) -> R e. Ring ) |
| 7 | 2 | #P_subrgid | |- ( R e. Ring -> B e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. CRing ) -> B e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 2 | #P_evlval | |- Q = ( ( I evalSub R ) ` B ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( I mPoly ( R |`s B ) ) = ( I mPoly ( R |`s B ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( R |`s B ) = ( R |`s B ) |
| 12 | 9, 10, 11, 4, 2 | #P_evlsrhm | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. CRing /\ B e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) -> Q e. ( ( I mPoly ( R |`s B ) ) RingHom T ) ) |
| 13 | 8, 12 | #P_mpd3an3 | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. CRing ) -> Q e. ( ( I mPoly ( R |`s B ) ) RingHom T ) ) |
| 14 | 2 | #P_ressid | |- ( R e. CRing -> ( R |`s B ) = R ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. CRing ) -> ( R |`s B ) = R ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. CRing ) -> ( I mPoly ( R |`s B ) ) = ( I mPoly R ) ) |
| 17 | 16, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. CRing ) -> ( I mPoly ( R |`s B ) ) = W ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. CRing ) -> ( ( I mPoly ( R |`s B ) ) RingHom T ) = ( W RingHom T ) ) |
| 19 | 13, 18 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. CRing ) -> Q e. ( W RingHom T ) ) |
